entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73330
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync() does not load anything #73327
  • The editor config should allow specifying whether a warning is included in code cleanup #73321
  • explicit lambda return type behavior with covariant delegates #73319

Closed

  • Debug assertion failure in MethodSymbol.AsMember when called from NullableWalker.GetNullableOfTValueSlot #73182
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Add helper for common pattern of producing an array. #73336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add public API for ref like type parameters #73335
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add additional extension type tests #73334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve analyzer consistency check message #73329
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Move more code over to producer/consumer model #73331
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Port runtime's Parallel.ForEachAsync so we can use it on NetFx. #73332
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add tests for extensions and Find-Refs #73333
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add intellisense support for extension types. #73315
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move more code over to ProducerConsumer model. #73324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add AutomationPeer for inheritance marign glyph #73311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide a ProducerConsumer helper for processing a sequence of items in parallel. #73323
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a producer/consumer queue to search for computing refactorings #73322
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #73318
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Switch to a producer/consumer queue to search for add-using results. #73320
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make tests consistent #73316
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add tasks for running a new vscode instance with a specific language server #69865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
